title: the boards
body:
well i haven't been on the boards yet as i stopped playing roughly after they were set in place.
they are weird, strange and feel a bit uncomfortable.
same experience as going to a new school and you look around at the class you got put in like "this place makes me feel weird.."

also i feel an emptiness after the off topic area has disappeared .. anyone care to tell me how to navigate this?
i need to learn the system

replies.body: the only place that matters is misc. you click on the names on the left to go to different sections of the boards.

Yeah miscellaneous is basically the "General Discussion" section. The only board that gets any attention paid too :P It might be worth popping over to NA from time to time since there is much more activity over there.
